attributes.action: give a knighthood to Henry Allingham, aged 112,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Henry Allingham, 112, served in WW1 and was a pioneer of aerial reconnaisance. In WW2 his important work kept the port of Harwich clear of mines. Please act quickly due to Mr Allingham's advanced years.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
